Contents

Top-Performing Institutions - 2024 Boren Awards

Top Overseas Locations & Languages - 2024 Boren Awards

Top-Performing Institutions

In 2024, the national nominating panel selected 102 Boren Fellows and 215 Boren Scholars from 245 graduate and 625 undergraduate applications. The institutions cited below were the top recipients of these awards based on initial selections -- i.e. before declined awards and the promotion of alternates. The top schools in each category are listed, including ties.
